extension.description: [I]What do you need more?[/I][CR][CR][B]Quantum Live Sport[/B][CR][CR]This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.[CR][CR]The author does not host any of the content in this addon and takes no responsibility for content found.
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This is a private addon and simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!.
